channel.title: Go Humble! RSS GAMES
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle games bundles!

item.title: Focus Entertainment Bundle 2026
item.content:encoded: Explore the epic variety of Focus Entertainment with our latest high-octane game bundle! Every step forward comes equipped with two steps backwards in the dark, brutal, and breathtaking world of the award-winning A Plague Tale: Requiem and A Plague Tale: Innocence. Play as lightning-powered cowboys fighting monsters in Evil West. Defeat legendary monsters in spectacular fashion in Atlas Fallen: Reign of Sand. Pay what you want and help support the charity of your choice with Humble Bundle!

item.title: Humble 15 Time Capsule
item.content:encoded:
It’s our birthday, and everyone’s invited! We’re kicking off our 15th Anniversary of Humble Bundle with this collection of our favorite roguelikes and adventure games. Discover 5 fresh, never-before-bundled indie titles, paired with favorites from our very first bundles. Uncover the mysteries of a fantastical fantasy world alongside your own charming creations in the intricate strategy game Oddsparks: An Automation Adventure! Master the magic of the written word and save the Atheneum from evil in Inkbound! Take charge of an eldritch arena and wield powerful weapons against demonic foes in Kill Knight! Explore a haunted island, lift a curse, and find your missing pirate crew in Mark of the Deep! Celebrate 15 years of Humble along with one of our first charity partners: Child’s Play Charity!

Keys expire. Please redeem Bionic Bay before September 11th, 2026. All other titles should be redeemed before March 11th, 2027

item.title: Beamdog & Owlcat: RPG Masters
item.description: Killer RPGs from the modern masters
item.content:encoded:
CRPG fans, this is the one you’ve been waiting for! Owlcat and Beamdog are responsible for some of the finest RPGs of the last decade—now’s your chance to snag both their entire catalogs in a single epic bundle! Explore the grimdark future like never before in Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader. Shake the very foundations of Golarion in Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous. Get all these games and more—including classics like Baldur’s Gate: Enhanced Edition, Neverwinter Nights: Complete Adventures, and many more. Plus, your purchase helps support DonorsChoose!

Keys expire. Please redeem Pathfinder: Kingmaker - Season Pass and Pathfinder: Kingmaker - Enhanced Plus Edition before September 11th, 2026. All other titles should be redeemed before March 11th, 2027

item.title: Call of the Wild 9th Anniversary
item.description: The most realistic hunting sim roaming these lands
item.content:encoded:
Jump into the dynamic and realistic world of theHunter: Call of the Wild and experience a new level of hunting realism. This value-packed game bundle features a massive collection of add-ons and DLC. Hunt the rich Emerald Coast of Australia, the snowy peaks of the New England Mountains, and more. Take on alligators, lions, and other voracious predators and sell their pelts for supplies and coins. Pay what you want for the ultimate theHunter: Call of the Wild experience, and help support One Tree Planted with your purchase!

Keys expire. Please redeem all titles before March 6th, 2027.

item.title: Overwhelming Positive Games Bundle
item.content:encoded:
Featuring games with over 500 reviews, and 95% approval rates, the Overwhelmingly Positive bundle is jam packed with crowd pleasers. Unleash your inner party monster alone or with friends in Monster Prom 4: Monster Con. Experience 2025’s unique, cult favorite, plinko-style roguelike Nubby's Number Factory. Craft your deck to hold back the hordes of baddies boarding the Monster Train, and so much more. Add certified bangers to your library and help support the It Gets Better Project all at the same time!

Keys expire. Please redeem before February 25, 2027.

item.title: Love You to Death Bundle
item.description: Our bloody Valentine's day gift to you
item.content:encoded:
February is the month of connection and romance, and there’s no better way to celebrate than with the horror games from our all-new Love You to Death Bundle! Try Ghost Watchers—the goosebump-inducing co-op ghost-hunting journey, Have a Nice Death—the adorably addicting action roguelike starring everyone’s favorite scythe-wielding bearer of death, Iron Lung—the claustrophobic journey through the bottom of a blood-filled alien ocean, and so much more. Find out what makes you scream and help support Coral Guardian with your purchase.

Keys expire. All titles should be redeemed before March 4th, 2027.

item.title: Sci-Fi Shooters 2.0
item.content:encoded:
Heat up the dark days of winter with a scorching-hot bundle of iconic shooters! Explore the frigid unknown of deep space in the genre-defining System Shock 2: 25th Anniversary Remaster, infiltrate the Galactic Empire as a covert Rebel Alliance operative in Star Wars: Dark Forces Remaster, and send hoards of demonic forces back to their fiery homeland in DOOM Eternal. Grab these rockin’ remasters of legendary sci-fi shooters—and support One Tree Planted and Cool Effect with your purchase!

Keys expire. Please redeem Battle Shapers, System Shock 2: 25th Anniversary Remaster, and STAR WARS: Dark Forces Remaster before August 20th, 2026. All other titles should be redeemed before February 20th, 2027.
